definitions.definition: the action or process of formally consulting or discussing.
examples: they improved standards in consultation with consumer representatives
synonyms: deliberation "the need for further consultation with industry"

definitions.definition: a meeting with an expert or professional, such as a medical doctor, in order to seek advice.
examples: meeting, talk, discussion, interview, audience, hearing; Moreappointment, session; formalconfabulation, colloquy "a 30-minute consultation"Moreappointment, session; confabulation, colloquy a 30-minute consultation
